job_description:
Who We Are

We believe that open-source software, open standards and APIs are the greatest transformational tools for organizations in the modern software development era.

Our mission at Diagrid is to provide developers with APIs and tools that help them focus on their code and not on infrastructure. As online digital services need to handle more load and run on multiple clouds or on-premises environments, programming to higher level abstractions delivers consistent, secure and reliable code that is easily portable and helps organizations de-risk their projects.

Diagrid is founded by the creators of the Dapr and KEDA open-source projects, and who led the user experience, design and development of hyper-scale infrastructure cloud services, serverless platforms and open-source projects at Microsoft.

We are backed by top VC firms and supported with industry leading investors and advisors including Joe Beda (Kubernetes Co-Founder, former Co-Founder / CTO at Heptio) Matt Klein (Creator of Envoy, Lyft), Mark Russinovich (CTO, Microsoft Azure), William Morgan (Creator of Linkerd, CEO Buoyant), Seth Vargo (Senior Staff Engineer, Google), Kris Nova (Kubernetes and distributed systems engineer), Adam Gross (Former CEO, Heroku), Sri Viswanath (Former CTO, Atlassian), Adam Frankl (Dev Marketing Expert, Neo4J & JFrog), and Roopak Venkatakrishnan (Head of platforms, Bolt).

As a Senior Software Engineer at Diagrid Cloud, you’ll own the design, architecture and implementation of new capabilities while improving the system's resiliency and operational excellence. You will factor into your work on user experience, security, performance and reliability to deliver unparalleled product experience and operational excellence.

Diagrid Cloud currently includes Conductor as our first offering, while a new service is being developed to be launched in the end of 2023. You will get to work on delivering cutting edge features and improve operational excellence of our services, bringing industry best-practices to monitor, remediate and prevent incidents.

You are a great fit if you love operational excellence as much as building new features, while tackling the challenges of complex distributed systems.

Responsibilities
Design and build Diagrid’s critical cloud infrastructure services that power up our SaaS products
Design and document operational knowledge and best practices
Design and build cloud services that are scalable, secure and reliable
Build a solid engineering foundation based upon cloud-native open-source projects
Design and document high level abstractions, APIs and interfaces
Shape the engineering culture and set standards as the company grows

Qualifications
5+ years of experience in designing and building distributed systems
2+ years operating a public cloud service or platform in production
2+ years of experience with Go
2+ years of experience with Kubernetes, Docker or other container based systems
2+ years of experience with Google Cloud or similar cloud provider
Solid understanding of computer science principles with a focus on distributed systems
Excellent communication skills
Ability to mentor early career engineers
Bonus: experience with Dapr

Additional Benefits
Work remotely
Unlimited time off
Choice of hardware
Equity
Medical, dental & vision coverage for you and your dependents
$1000 for home office setup
Collaborative and supportive team
Chance to collaborate with industry leading figures

‍

Our Tech Stack

At Diagrid, we believe in using open-source tools and protocols to get the job done, while respecting the age old "pick the right tool for the right job" saying. As such, we expect our tech stack to be dynamic and evolving in nature while retaining our open-source strategy.

We use:
Golang
Node.js
Typescript
React
Redux
MySQL 8.x with InnoDB
Cortex
Kubernetes
Docker
Envoy
Multiple cloud platforms, mainly GCP
